page.name: Optional - Make a video to introduce yourself to the class
page.intro: This link will allow you to use Flipgrid to record a short video to introduce yourself to me and to the rest of the class.
page.content:
Use the tool below to sign in to Flipgrid and record a video.  Click on the "Log in with Microsoft" button to log in to Flipgrid using your CBU e-mail.  You can watch my video first if you like and watch any other student videos that are already there.  There will be a green "+" button which will allow you to record your own video using the camera and microphone on your computer.

This is strictly optional, but if lots of you do it then it should help us start to develop a bit of a sense of community in the class.
